This game is hilarious! :)

If you already played Portal and decide to play this game too, you'll get some more history about GLaDoS and the company Aperture Science. Aaaaand the game funny thanks to GlaDoS and Wheatley :)

This game has enough good reviews to last a lifetime. But I'll give it a shot anyway.

This game is perfect. If I were to recommend any single PC game to a friend, this would be it, the most essential game to own for any PC gamer. Or any sort of gamer. Or any person at all, really. 

This game has everything. The levels are spectacular: from the gorgeous overgrown testing chambers of the modern Aperture Laboratories to the goo-covered classic Aperture Science Innovators levels of the 1950s, there is always something amazing and new to look at. 

And the puzzles? The best in gaming. Portal 2 has all of the fun puzzles that you loved from the original, plus a myriad of new features that make you feel clever and stupid at the same time. Classic Portal.

The story of Portal 2 introduces Wheatley, your rescuer from your prison cell within Aperture Labs and loyal companion ([spoiler]sorry Companion Cube[/spoiler]), and Cave Johnson, the founder of Aperture Science who you "meet" through prerecorded messages that play throughout the levels. Both characters are hilarious and end up with surprisingly deep character arcs. And, of course, GLaDOS returns with her usual compliments and motivational speeches to help you along.

In short, this game had me laughing and pulling my hair out at the same time and I've never enjoyed myself more. Portal 2 is much deeper and more cinematic than Portal in most of its aspects, but mostly in its story. The ending made me sit with my jaw hanging open for what felt like 10 minutes; it alone was a masterpiece of storytelling. All of this from a puzzle game

On the off chance that you haven't already picked up a copy of this game and aren't just reading reviews to affirm your own opinion, I strongly urge you to quit reading reviews and just try it. You won't regret it.

Fun to play, especially with friends.

Esse jogo tem tudo e mais um pouco do que se é preciso para ser uma obra prima:
Excelente design, com puzzles elegantes que conseguem ser complexos mesmo com elementos e jogabilidade relativamente simples.
Muita imersão no universo do jogo, auxiliada de uma ótima trilha sonora e ambientação.
Enredo sensacional, com mistérios, reviravoltas e personagens cativantes (e isso tudo com uma pitada bem grande de humor!).
E mesmo depois de concluir o modo principal ainda existem muitas horas de jogo, com criação de mapas, fases dos usuários e o modo co-op.
Com certeza um dos melhores jogos já feitos, uma experiência única. 10/10
One of the classics, absolutely loved it!

16.10.13  单人模式通关撒花纪念，大概用了14小时


===原评测====

刚通了1代，2代刚开始玩。
首先让我惊讶的是1代2代竟然配置要求都非常低，我的渣MacBook air集成显卡也能流畅运行，2代甚至风扇响声还没1代大。从没见过优化这么好的游戏。
从开始的剧情画面上看，1代更像一款硬核独立游戏，2代更有一点大作的气质。
从上手难度来看，2代上手比1代简单，新手提示也做得更到位。后续会不会比1难还不知道。
虽然两款都是98%好评神作，但考虑到这类游戏挺杀时间，如果时间有限建议直接玩2代。
玩1代的好处是对背景剧情有更多了解，因为2一开始就是光圈公司崩坏，之前的背景没有介绍。

先写这些，待更。
=====
第一章最末尾的场景即是1代的最终boss战废墟。好怀念。

=====
进程过半，目前玩到第七章。
中间有些部分还是比较难的，看了两次攻略。主要是道具比一代复杂了许多，有些地方就不是靠乱试就能找到答案的。
中间谜题部分玩久了有些枯燥。然而第五章结尾剧情大转折，又一下子有了干劲。


====
晾了大半年，这两天拾起来继续往下打。
六、七章是逃脱剧情，主要是找白色墙壁和各种高空弹跳，这部分难度不算很高，但白色墙壁有时候很小又很高，到后来都养成了没事抬头走路的『好』习惯。
第八章回到实验室，一看有19关吓尿，还好实际上没这么多。最后一关有点难看了攻略才过。

====
16.10.13 通关撒花~~
第九章是最后一章，没什么难度，但音乐紧张剧情也非常好。最大的惊喜来自boss战，击败boss的脑洞真是给开发者跪了。好评如潮！！
结尾[spoiler]还挺感人的，一代的大反派GlaDOS竟然说出了那样温情的话，看着昔日让自己逃得屁滚尿流的Turret炮台收起红外探测，在一片合唱中目送『我』重返地面获得自由，顿时觉得辛苦这么久，值了。[/spoiler]

整部作品没什么可挑剔的，从创意到可玩性，到剧情、音乐、优化，全都满分。最爱的是GlaDOS和Weatley的配音，印象非常深刻。接下去有时间再玩玩合作模式。同时非常希望出第三代（虽然听说G胖不会数3……）
非常动脑经的游戏。。

WARNING: THIS GAME MAY BE ADDICTING AND LEAVE YOU WANTING MORE

The Portal series of games have a very simple concept. You must make your way thru a testing facility ripe with obstacles and armed only with a gun that shoots 2 different colored portals into surfaces (walls, floors, ceilings, panels, etc.). You enter one of the portals and come out the other while being prompted along by a sarcastically condescending and evil (?) female voiced AI. Simple right? Mwahaha ... think and think again :)

The game was artfully made. The ambience of the testing facility is nothing less than captivating. Each test chamber is a game in and of itself. With each completed test chamber you'll get a "pat yourself on the back" sense of achievement. 

Try it - You'll like it.

通关这款游戏之后，我不自觉地鼓起了掌。
如果说portal给我带来的是无尽的回味，那么portal2给我带来的就是无尽的震撼。

剧情与人设：一般的游戏会直接告诉玩家，你处于什么样的环境，要做什么样的事。稍微好一点的游戏，会借个NPC之口告知世界观。然而在portal2，GLaDOS永远也不会对你说：“你这是在光圈科技的实验室，我想杀了你，你要......”玩家需要从富有西方幽默的对话中汲取信息，加入对自己的理解，才能理解自己身处何种境地。光圈公司的背后究竟是什么？这个公司的历史是怎样的？这种代入感是前所未有的。对话充满了整个游戏却毫无烦杂之感。人设方面，虽然作为人工智能，却有着各自鲜明的性格特点。崇尚科学而毒舌的GLaDOS，拥有强烈自尊心甚至傲慢的Wheatley......他们是机器人，却又不是机器人。

谜题设置：难度比portal略高，解谜要素变得更加多样。最重要的是，portal2很注重把谜题融入到剧情和环境中，而不是整个游戏一关一个房间这样。解密游戏的通病就是硬生生的把谜题强插在剧情当中，十分生硬。portal2丝毫没有这种感觉。你不觉得你是在解谜题，你只是觉得你在用智慧不断前进。直达现在我还在为结尾的最后一枪拍案叫绝。

操作：说到有关人工智能的解密游戏，很多人会想到《The Talos Principle》，这款游戏也很优秀，但是我不能玩它超过40分钟，原因是3D眩晕感太过强烈，操作的平滑程度优化不到位。然而我可以连续玩portal2几个小时不厌倦，操作流畅而平滑，防3D眩晕处理十分到位，麻麻再也不用担心我晕3D了。

留给看到测评最后的同学：有功夫看测评不如赶紧买买买啊！

Echt gute Weitererzählung des Vorgängers Portal. Der Nachfolger ist lustig und hat sehr viel Charme.
Kaum zu glauben das man aus Portal eine tiefgründige Geschichte erzählen kann, die dennoch recht solide und spannend ist. Auch Eastereggs sind wieder reichlich vorhanden, auch wieder die Referenz zu Black Mesa (Half Life) wie schon im Vorspiel ist wieder dabei. Abwechslungen/ Neuerungen sind auch in Portal 2 sehen die es im Vorgänger noch nicht gab wie z.B.: Gel oder Laser.

Ein wirklich gutes Spiel für Leute die mal ein paar Rätzel machen wollen und schon den recht kurzen Vorgänger mochten.
Aber ich empfehle durchaus den Vorgänger davor zu spielen da man dann besser die Geschichte und die Einzelheiten versteht.
